summary: A western set on the New Mexico frontier a few years after the Civil War and centered on a struggling young family and the mining company who wants to buy their land.
cast: Barlow Jacobs|Clare Bowen|David Call|Joseph Lyle Taylor|Richard Riehle|Jerry Clarke|Adam O'Byrne|Travis Hammer|Luce Rains|William Sterchi
title: Dead Man's Burden
